summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 226 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1809 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and calm and still conditions are expected. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
